channel.title: Cheatsheets on Masoopy
channel.description: Recent content in Cheatsheets on Masoopy

item.title: Tips and Tricks
item.description: Pop up a quick PHP server docker run -p 8080:80 -v $(pwd):/var/www/html php:apache

item.title: Crack me up!
item.description: Cracking all the things! NTLM hashes : hashcat -m 5600 $file /path/to/wordlist -O

item.title: Got Shell!?
item.description: What to do when you have a shell? Linux history whoami uname -a cat /etc/issue cat /etc/passwd sudo -l crontab -l ls -lhtrR /etc/cron* ls -lhtrR /home Windows set getuid ipconfig /all arp -a netstat -ano dir C:\

item.title: Popping a Shell!
